name: Synchronise News Ticker
author: Mohammad Jahidul Alam Rudro

sections.description:
Synchronise News Ticker is a lightweight plugin used to animating a simple news ticker.You can customise type speed, post count, category selection, color,background color via shortcode.
Want to see how it works please click here: http://synchronisebd.com/product/synchronise-news-ticker-wordpress-plugin/
Powered By:Synchronise IT

How do I install this plugin?

You can install this plugin as like other plugin of install, no difference.

Why this plugin does not have link support in ticker?

If you need link support in ticker you have to purchase premium version.

Can i get RSS feed in this ticker?

No in this version but you can if you purchase the premium one.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use shortcode in page, post or in widget
  4. If you want to use news ticker in your theme function place ” in your templates.

Shortcodes
1. General Ticker

[ticker_list  id="1"]

2. Ticker with custom color and Background-color

[ticker_list id="2" color="cyan" backgroundcolor="white"]

3. Ticker with Speed Change

[ticker_list id="3" text="LATEST NEWS" typespeed="100" speed="1000" backgroundcolor="#428BCA"]

4. Ticker with ctaegory ID

[ticker_list id="4" text="BREAKING NEWS" typespeed="300" speed="2000" category_slug="category_ID"]
